Articles.Content: Was YOUR account lost that day? I'm unfortunately a victim and suffered a terrible loss of my account around this time last year xD
Funny thing, my account wasn't wiped but I didn't have a single post left, hehe. Apparently I had registered just in time.
There is another.....
My account hadn't been wiped, but I lost a good 300-400 posts and some rep
I lost some posts and rep, but not too much, since I tend to lurk more than post.
I survived. Several of my then-150-ish posts had been massacred and I lost a thread I was working on at the time. It could have been a lot worse, that's for sure.
I did have to re-register, but I still had all 5 of my posts once I logged back in.

Both my account, and most of my posts survived. Though the latter is mostly because of my lack of activity.

I tend to lurk more than I post though. I usually drop by the forums at least once a day.

I did have to re-register, but I still had all 5 of my posts once I logged back in.

Oh rly? I re-registered and had to do that thing where they monitor your first few posts again and had no posts. My heart go out to all of you
My account was lost but I wasn't really an active member back then.
I lost my account, but fortunately I was inspired to actually start reading the forums and commenting on things (before April I had not really used the forums much). I'm glad I did.
My account was lost but I wasn't really checking the forums.
Wasn't wiped, but most of my rep and a thousand posts were lost in that day. Including a stickyed thread I made.
I did not make it out alive.
T'was a dark day indeed.
My account was lost, and at first I didn't realize that it had been. Very embarrassing.
I got spared by the wipe, but plenty of my posts were gone. Good thing I wasn't as active back then as I am now, though.
The wipe actually messed up my join date without removing my account. It should read "January 2012" instead of "August 2012".
Its been a year already since the Great April Derp? I remember having like 250 posts but then it got wiped.
I lost hundreds of posts but I my account was safe
I too survived the forum wipe, just. I also didn't lose many posts due to not really having a posting mentality.

Wasn't wiped, but most of my rep and a thousand posts were lost in that day. Including a stickyed thread I made.

Stickied threads are probably the most difficult thing to get in forums. My condolences.

I... well, despite how it looks, was not around at that time, despite the fact i seemed to join with everyone else.

but, as you can see, i joined in early may.
I'd say I lost as much posts as I have now. Also a few of my mod's threads. That was a weird period, without zero information.
I lost around 500 posts?
